title: Rant
body:
In promos, playing sated jungler, get invaded but don't die, skip to 7 minutes in and other team has 9 kills spread across them all, top tower taken and our mid goes afk. game snowballs super hard, team act like we have late game when other team has yasuo, trynd and  vayne. Team blame me when they all died 1-2 times within the first 7 minutes.... WHAT THE FUCK IS THIS GAME LOL

http://screencast.com/t/cofcdy14t
(didn't go sated because i figured 0 control of jungle and somehow in the mid game we actually got a bunch of kills and that was a wu support)

I feel like god bitch slapped me.

replies.body: It happens. Nothing you can do as jungler if every single lane loses.. Once you lose your jungle you lose the game

Only thing you can do if all lanes fail is try and get other objectives(Dragon, blue/red buffs, try solo dragon).
OR BE BRONZE AND DC(0% chance I ever recommend this one)
I see your problem... D for Dlash F for smite

Id say you did a good job as you did.
Wukong didnt go support, more the n likely said he was going too but did nothing of the sort.
I hate it when people call support, then don't support at all. You buying vision doesn't mean your supporting.

And jax, somehow fed trynd really badly.

Just a very unlucky game to get those types of players.
